Header.title: Fashion And Clothing...
Header.paragraph: TA Merchandise is an online group of companies that operates in the fashion & clothing industry and online shopping for fabrics... Let's be your plug on anything Fashion and Clothing

About.paragraph: TA Merchandise is one of the first online fashion designing and fabric retailing platform that delivers apparel and accessories, maximizes entrepreneur productivity and simplifies the manufacturing process. We empower, stimulate and cultivate fashion talent worldwide, revolutionizing and democratizing the entire fashion industry. Our mission is to promote fashion and fabric manufacturing worldwide

Services.name: Fabric Prototyping
Services.text: TA Merchandise can assist you with the sewing of your clothing samples. Our experts will assist you with perfect garment construction. We have an experienced team with dexterous creativity.

Services.name: Retail Store Planning
Services.text: Develop thematic concepts for fashion retailers. Design and execute floor plan, fixtures, lighting, and display systems for optimum presentation.

Services.name: Technical Drawings and Renderings
Services.text: Render technical drawings with all dimensions and written instructions needed to produce prototype. High quality renderings and fashion illustrations suitable for scanning or faxing.

Services.name: Brand Analysis
Services.text: In-depth research of client's brand perspective and evaluation of product line. Submit report on findings, highlighting existing brand strengths and opportunities.

Services.name: Logistics and Supply Chain
Services.text: TA Merchandise offer services designed for the international Fashion and Clothing and Online Retailing industries.

Services.name: Fashion Reporting
Services.text: Shop Europe or worldwide cities for key retail trends. Submit report, compile media presentation or personally or personally present trends along with photographs.
